text:
Hello !

Could one please request the upload of the new 2.0 release - at least the webdav
client - to ibiblio (http://www.ibiblio.org/maven/slide/jars)?
It is needet within commons-vfs and there seems to be a problem with the
proxy-handling in the currently uploaded 2.0beta1 version.

Thank you very much!
creator: mario@ops.co.at
